review: For the price it far exceeds what I was expecting. I wish I could speak what I want instead of going the manual way.

review: GREAT DEVICE!!! Only thing is that it's a little slow sometimes but for the size and the price I really can't complain! I will most likely be buying the Amazon Fire TV to be the main unit at home and I will travel with the Fire TV stick.
author: Shaun

review: Awesome little gadget. Easy to setup, easy to install remote app for my phone. Such a great deal for $40.

review: I am technologically impaired and this was soooo easy!

review: Ease of use, content amount and quality are awsome. Never have pauses or stuttering. Hope more updates keep coming. Love it

review: not as impressive as I thought

review: Made my Dumb TV Smart. And goes straight to the only two things I use it for... Prime and Netflix. I'm sure there are a bunch of other features I'm missing out on.
